Detailed Description

Parses an MBIS file image from an in-memory image.

MBIS stands for MoBileer Instrument Set. It is a file that contains one or more ME1000 or ME2000 instruments.

Author:
Phil Burk Copyright 2007 Mobileer, PROPRIETARY and CONFIDENTIAL

)

Create a parser for a MBIS file.

Parameters:
parserPtr Pointer to a variable that will receive a pointer to the new parser.
sio Stream of a file or memory image containing a MBIS data
Returns:
0 If no error, or the following:
Exceptions:
SPMIDI_Error_OutOfMemory not enough free memory to allocate parser

Exceptions:
